title: Azir in game bug please fix asap
body: When playing as azir {{champion:268}}  in a ranked game i noticed his soldiers autos for one are not the range they should be autoing at. second when you use autos with the soldiers azir walks towards the soldiers instead of standing in place regardless of how far or near he is to them. i was attacking a blue buff too and standing right on top of it autoing when azir just randomly starts walking toward enemy base. so please fix it it wasnt very hard to replicate just play azir and try using his soldiers. also the LB i was playing against  could w through my ult which should have been impassable but that may have just been a near miss of the ult im not sure but will throw it in.

replies.body: This should be fixed with patch 6.6. Let me know if you're still having issues. ^-^
known bug theyre working on this
